dkeep.logic

Class Coords

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Coords

  • public class Coords
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to represent positions using x and y coordinates
    Author:
    Miguel

      • directionMoved

        public char directionMoved(Coords that)
        Calculate the direction something moved given its current and previous position
        Parameters:
        that - Old coordinates
        Returns:
        's' if down, 'a' if left, 'w' if up, 'd' if right or by default

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Get current position in x
        Returns:
        Integer with the same value as the position on the x axis
